name: Nightmare Before Disney: Back to Hell
name_original: Nightmare Before Disney: Back to Hell
description:
Seem like you have woken up.. Back to your nightmares, where the cursed and nightmare-ish one are here to haunt you...

Nightmare Before Disney: Back to Hell is created with BGE (Blender Game Engine). And done it in solo.

Which is it me, and yes. It is my first game with this game engine that nobody cared about. Plus some critics to me...

Plus note, some things are missing like cameras. Which in case... Might take much longer to make every room and these two rats in DEMO for each camera pose.

And this demo build, it won't be that great. Of course compiling the .exe might have some errors and bugs, but I might recompile once Range Engine 1.2 is here (which is forked UPBGE!).
